item.title: 关税休战让中美贸易畅通无阻
item.description: 全球最大的两个经济体之间的关税之争停火，鼓励了太平洋地区的贸易，在集装箱预订开始放缓的情况下，三周以来的货运价格仍在上涨。【原文：The ceasefire in the tariff fight between the world’s two largest economies is encouraging trade across the Pacific, holding up freight prices three weeks on, even as container bookings have begun to slow.】

item.title: 沙特公用事业公司希望在马来西亚开展价值 100 亿美元的可再生能源项目
item.description: 沙特公用事业公司 Acwa 电力公司与马来西亚公司签署了不具约束力的协议，包括探讨到 2040 年开发约 13 千兆瓦的发电能力，投资总额达 100 亿美元。【原文：Saudi utility Acwa Power Co. signed non-binding agreements with Malaysian firms, including to explore development of about 13 gigawatts of power generation capacity, totaling $10 billion in investments by 2040.】

item.title: 伊朗贸易引关注，马来西亚近海油轮停航
item.description: 由于美国制裁的威胁，伊朗至中国石油贸易的重要枢纽油轮正从数字跟踪系统中消失，迫使其改变策略，以保持原油流动。【原文：Tankers involved in a vital hub of the Iran-to-China oil trade are disappearing from digital tracking systems, as the threat of US sanctions forces tactical changes to keep crude flowing.】

item.title: Glencore 通过澳大利亚实体整合全球煤炭投资组合
item.description: 矿业和贸易公司 Glencore Plc 向澳大利亚监管机构提交的年度报告显示，该公司将其全球煤炭和铁合金资产组合整合到一家在澳大利亚注册的公司旗下。【原文：Mining and trading house Glencore Plc consolidated its global portfolio of coal and ferroalloy assets under one company registered in Australia, according to its annual report lodged with the country’s regulator.】

item.title: 特朗普在美国钢铁业的 "黄金股份 "为何会黯然失色？
item.description: 作为批准日本新日铁公司以 140 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司的条件之一，美国政府可能获得美国钢铁公司的所谓黄金股份或类似权力。【原文：The US government could receive a so-called golden share — or powers akin to it — in United States Steel Corp. as a condition for approving a $14 billion takeover by Japan’s Nippon Steel Corp.】

item.title: 新的贸易不确定性刺激避险需求，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 本周早些时候，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的全球关税计划和美国经济实力的不确定性再次令市场惶恐不安，黄金收复了一些重大损失。【原文：Gold recovered some heavy losses sustained earlier this week, as markets were once again rattled by uncertainties around US President Donald Trump’s global tariffs agenda and the strength of the US economy.】

item.title: 罗根发出信号：美联储调整利率可能尚需时日
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行行长洛里-洛根（Lorie Logan）表示，官员们可能还需要一段时间才能知道经济将如何应对关税和其他政策变化，从而知道应该如何调整利率。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas President Lorie Logan signaled it may take a while before officials know how the economy will respond to tariffs and other policy changes and thus how they should adjust interest rates.】

item.title: 国债下跌，新兴市场高收益债券或将跑赢同行
item.description: 根据彭博社的分析，由于美元下滑削弱了国债收益率的上升，风险较高的新兴市场债券可能会继续跑赢收益率较低的同类债券，从而保护投资者的回报。【原文：Riskier emerging-market bonds may continue to beat their lower-yielding peers as the dollar’s slide softens a rise in Treasury yields, protecting investor returns, according to analysis by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 中国 Z 世代热衷游戏，网易股价逼近历史新高
item.description: 网易公司股价正接近四年多来的首个历史新高，年轻消费主义浪潮为中国游戏股增添了一系列利好因素。【原文：NetEase Inc. shares are closing in on their first new all-time high in over four years, as a wave of youthful consumerism adds to a host of positives for China’s game stocks.】

item.title: 关税动荡导致全球资金重新涌入日本股市
item.description: 关税动荡正吸引全球投资者重返日本股市，因为更好的股东回报前景吸引了逃离美国经济不确定性的资金。【原文：Tariff turmoil is drawing global investors back to Japan’s stock market, as prospects of better shareholder returns entice funds fleeing economic uncertainty in the US.】

item.title: 贝森特称特朗普与习近平通话可能有助于会谈 "略有停滞
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，与中国的贸易谈判 "有点停滞不前"，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国国家主席习近平之间可能需要通一次电话，世界上最大的两个经济体才能达成协议。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said trade talks with China are “a bit stalled,” and that a call between President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping may be needed for the world’s two largest economies to reach a deal.】

item.title: 东京房价两年来最大涨幅给石破带来压力
item.description: 东京物价创下两年来最大涨幅，这是首相石破茂在夏季大选前的一个令人担忧的迹象，也将使央行在未来几个月内再次加息。【原文：Prices in Tokyo jumped the most in two years, in a worrisome sign for Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba ahead of a summer election, and one that will keep the central bank on track for another rate hike in coming months.】

item.title: 石油有望在欧佩克+（OPEC+）供应决定前迎来第二周下跌
item.description: 在欧佩克+（OPEC+）就产量政策召开会议之前，石油有望出现第二次单周下跌。【原文：Oil was on track for a second weekly decline ahead of an OPEC+ meeting on output policy that’s expected to lead to another supply hike.】

item.title: 中国银行面临存款外流和到期带来的流动性考验
item.description: 中国的银行将在 6 月份接受流动性测试，因为它们面临着创纪录的债务到期和潜在的存款外流。【原文：Chinese banks are set for a liquidity test in June as they face record debt maturities and a potential exodus from deposits.】

item.title: 对冲基金在经历了喜忧参半的一年后重返 Sohn 香港
item.description: 在经历了动荡的 12 个月后，Sohn 投资会议周五将重返香港，去年的一半选股都赚到了钱，这是一个不小的成就。【原文：After a tumultuous 12 months, it’s no small achievement that the Sohn investment conference returns to Hong Kong on Friday with the better half of last year’s picks having made money.】

item.title: 美国股市涨势减弱，亚洲市场开局疲软：市场综述
item.description: 由于美国经济放缓以及围绕唐纳德-特朗普总统贸易战的法律不确定性导致市场乐观情绪受挫，亚洲市场周五早盘将下跌。【原文：Asian markets were set to decline in early trading Friday as curbed market optimism was driven by a slowing US economy and legal uncertainties around President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 日本寿险公司将日元看涨对冲降至 14 年低点
item.description: 日本人寿保险公司将针对日元走强的海外资产保护措施降至 14 年来新低，表明对该国货币持续反弹的预期受到抑制。【原文：Japanese life insurers cut protection for their foreign assets against a stronger yen to a fresh 14-year low, signaling subdued expectations of a sustained rally in the nation’s currency.】

item.title: 微软在市政厅兜售人工智能，披露巴克莱银行合同
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）周四在全公司范围内举行的一次全体会议上介绍了其向企业客户销售人工智能工具的进展情况，其中包括与巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）达成的一项重要交易。【原文：Microsoft Corp. touted its progress selling artificial intelligence tools to corporate customers during a companywide town hall on Thursday, including a major deal with Barclays Plc.】

item.title: 美联储戴利称政策处于 "良好位置"，可以耐心等待
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）表示，货币政策处于 "良好的位置"，可以继续降低通胀。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly said monetary policy is in a “good place” to continue to bring inflation down.】

item.title: 戴尔年度利润展望因人工智能服务器需求超出预期
item.description: 戴尔技术公司（Dell Technologies Inc.【原文：Dell Technologies Inc. gave a profit outlook for the year that exceeded estimates and said it had seen a significant increase in orders for servers to run AI networks.】

item.title: OpenAI 和 Anthropic 为迎接人工智能产品新时代做好准备
item.description: 领先的人工智能实验室正在努力将其技术进步转化为引人注目的应用程序和硬件设备。但首先...【原文：Leading AI labs are now working to turn their technical advances into compelling apps and hardware devices. But first...】

item.title: 特朗普大法案中隐晦的税收项目引发华尔街愤怒
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统正在国会强行通过的长达 1000 多页的税收和支出法案中，深藏着一项不起眼的税收措施，它在华尔街内外引发了恐慌。【原文：Buried deep in the more than 1,000-page tax-and-spending bill that President Donald Trump is muscling through Congress is an obscure tax measure that’s setting off alarms on Wall Street and beyond.】

item.title: 纽约时装学院将被日本教育集团收购
item.description: 据周四发布的消息，纽约市的一所时尚学校 LIM 学院将被日本教育基金会收购。【原文：LIM College, a fashion-focused school in New York City, will be acquired by the Japan Educational Foundation, according to a Thursday release.】

item.title: 上诉法院允许特朗普关税暂时继续有效
item.description: 联邦上诉法院暂时中止了针对唐纳德-特朗普总统全球关税的裁决，同时权衡是否要更长时间地搁置这一全面决定，美国政府誓言在必要时将此事提交美国最高法院。【原文：A federal appeals court temporarily paused a ruling against President Donald Trump’s global tariffs while weighing a longer lasting hold on the sweeping decision, with the administration vowing to take the matter to the US Supreme Court if necessary.】

item.title: 2020 年以来最繁忙的五月，公司债券销售额突破 1,500 亿美元
item.description: 美国投资级一级债券市场正在经历自 2020 年以来最繁忙的五月，因为关税压力的缓解刺激了企业趁机借贷，这一趋势可能会在下个月继续下去。【原文：The US investment-grade primary bond market is having its busiest May since 2020 as easing tariff pressure has spurred companies to borrow while they can, a trend that could continue next month.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会因举报人的执法线索向其奖励 70 万美元
item.description: 一名举报人因提供有关不当行为的信息，促使美国商品期货交易委员会展开调查并采取行动，将获得约 70 万美元的奖励。【原文：A whistleblower will receive roughly $700,000 for providing information about misconduct that prompted the US Commodity Futures Trading Commission to open an investigation and take action.】

item.title: 关于播客的播客，正在成为一种崇拜的播客
item.description:
Talking Talk is taking burgeoning podcast industry seriously and finding a growing audience on Instagram

.【原文：

Talking Talk is taking the burgeoning podcast industry seriously and finding a growing audience on Instagram

】

item.title: 通胀缓解，澳大利亚央行转向应对全球下行风险
item.description: 经过三年的抑制通胀运动，澳大利亚央行目前正将重点转向特朗普政府的关税制度和日益加剧的地缘政治动荡所带来的经济风险。【原文：After a three-year campaign to rein-in inflation, Australia’s central bank is now switching its focus to economic risks arising from the Trump administration’s tariff regime and mounting geopolitical upheaval.】

item.title: 电视网络陷入困境，QVC 债券持有人聘用 Centerview 和 Akin
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，QVC 集团面临着一堵债务墙，一群债券持有人已聘请 Centerview Partners 和 Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld 担任顾问。【原文：With a wall of debt facing QVC Group Inc., a group of bondholders has hired Centerview Partners as well as Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld as advisers, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 瑞安航空老板因股价触及目标而有望获得 1 亿欧元薪酬
item.description: 瑞安航空控股公司（Ryanair Holdings Plc）首席执行官迈克尔-奥利里（Michael O'Leary）刚刚有资格获得 1 亿欧元（约合 1.14 亿美元）的奖金，这是近年来欧洲上市公司高管获得的最大一笔奖金。【原文：Ryanair Holdings Plc’s chief executive officer has just become eligible for a €100-million ($114 million) bonus, granting Michael O’Leary one of the biggest payouts among European public company executives in recent years.】
